sample_docs: Large Scale Biometrics Systems Large Scale Biometrics Systems Multi-biometric systems for criminal justice, civil identity border control, and identity dominance missions. 40+ years of experience developing biometrics systems Widest user base in the industry with unmatched speed, scalability and accuracy Continuous investment in R&D with top performing algorithms in NIST evaluations Scalability proven with the world's largest biometrics systems Delivering tenprint and latent identification and facial recognition for 18,000+ law enforcement agencies that rely on IDEMIA NSS systems supporting US Federal biometric systems of record with over 100,000 searches per day against a gallery of 100 million+ identities Delivering fingerprint and iris identification for India's national ID program managing 1 million template creations and 350,000+ searches per day against a gallery of 1 billion+ records Multi-biometric systems for criminal justice, civil identity border control, and Finger: MorphoWave - the first high-speed, contactless fingerprint access solution. Captures and matches four fingerprints with a wave of the hand. Overcomes the challenges of wet/dry fingers and latent prints. NIST #1 ranked algorithms ensure unrivalled matching accuracy. Proven access gate integration for secure, frictionless, high throughput access solution Face: Morpho 3D Face Reader - lightning-speed, hands-free access to restricted areas using 3D face recognition - extremely accurate matching while ensuring high throughput Iris: Morpho IAD™ (Iris at a Distance) offers fast, non-intrusive iris recognition. High throughput: 2 irises + portrait in < 1 second Integrates easily into gates, counters, walls NIST #1 ranked algorithms for speed & accuracy Finger: MorphoWave - the first high-speed, contactless fingerprint access solution. Captures and matches four fingerprints with a wave of the hand. Overcomes the challenges of wet/dry fingers and latent prints. NIST #1 ranked algorithms ensure unrivalled matching accuracy. Proven access gate integration for secure, frictionless, high throughput access solution Captures and matches four fingerprints with a wave of the hand. Overcomes the challenges of wet/dry fingers and latent prints. NIST #1 ranked algorithms ensure unrivalled matching accuracy. Proven access gate integration for secure, frictionless, high throughput access solution Face: Morpho 3D Face Reader - lightning-speed, hands-free access to restricted areas using 3D face recognition - extremely accurate matching while ensuring high throughput Iris: Morpho IAD™ (Iris at a Distance) offers fast, non-intrusive iris recognition. High throughput: 2 irises + portrait in < 1 second Integrates easily into gates, counters, walls NIST #1 ranked algorithms for speed & accuracy High throughput: 2 irises + portrait in < 1 second Integrates easily into gates, counters, walls NIST #1 ranked algorithms for speed & accuracy

Morpho Video Analytic & Image Processing Platform (MVI) enables rapid analysis of complex, multi-source video content saving countless hours when it matters most. Facilitates post event video analysis and real-time face recognition Processes large volumes of heterogeneous surveillance video in minutes Streamlines analysis by extracting areas of interest including movement, persons, faces, and optionally license plates Enables customer-tailored applications such as searching video files against a specific gallery of face images Flexible deployment configurations to meet specific mission needs – on-premises, cloud, on an edge device, or in a portable jumpkit Morpho Video Analytic & Image Processing Platform (MVI) enables rapid analysis of complex, multi-source video content saving countless hours when it matters most.
